AddUserToGroup.title: AddUserToGroup
AddUserToGroup.summary: Adds a Resource Access Management (RAM) user to a RAM user group.

AttachPolicyToGroup.title: AttachPolicyToGroup
AttachPolicyToGroup.summary: Attaches a policy to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

AttachPolicyToRole.title: AttachPolicyToRole
AttachPolicyToRole.summary: Attaches a policy to a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

AttachPolicyToUser.title: AttachPolicyToUser
AttachPolicyToUser.summary: Attaches a policy to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

BindMFADevice.title: BindMFADevice
BindMFADevice.summary: Binds a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

ChangePassword.title: ChangePassword
ChangePassword.summary: Changes the password that is used to log on to the console for a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

ClearAccountAlias.title: ClearAccountAlias
ClearAccountAlias.summary: Deletes the alias of an Alibaba Cloud account.

CreateAccessKey.title: CreateAccessKey
CreateAccessKey.summary: Creates an AccessKey pair for a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

CreateLoginProfile.title: CreateLoginProfile
CreateLoginProfile.summary: Enables console logon for a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

CreatePolicyVersion.title: CreatePolicyVersion
CreatePolicyVersion.summary: Creates a version for a policy.

CreateRole.title: CreateRole
CreateRole.summary: Creates a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

CreateUser.title: CreateUser
CreateUser.summary: Creates a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

DecodeDiagnosticMessage.title: DecodeDiagnosticMessage
DecodeDiagnosticMessage.summary: Decodes the diagnostic information in the response that contains an access denied error. The error is caused by no RAM permissions.

DeleteAccessKey.title: DeleteAccessKey
DeleteAccessKey.summary: Deletes an AccessKey pair of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

DeleteGroup.title: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.summary: Deletes a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

DeleteLoginProfile.title: DeleteLoginProfile
DeleteLoginProfile.summary: Disables console logon for a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

DeleteRole.title: DeleteRole
DeleteRole.summary: Deletes a regular Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

DeleteUser.title: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.summary: Deletes a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

DetachPolicyFromGroup.title: DetachPolicyFromGroup
DetachPolicyFromGroup.summary: Detaches a policy from a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

DetachPolicyFromRole.title: DetachPolicyFromRole
DetachPolicyFromRole.summary: Detaches a policy from a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

DetachPolicyFromUser.title: DetachPolicyFromUser
DetachPolicyFromUser.summary: Detaches a policy from a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

GetAccountAlias.title: GetAccountAlias
GetAccountAlias.summary: Queries the alias of an Alibaba Cloud account.

GetGroup.title: GetGroup
GetGroup.summary: Queries information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

GetLoginProfile.title: GetLoginProfile
GetLoginProfile.summary: Queries the logon configurations of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

GetPasswordPolicy.title: GetPasswordPolicy
GetPasswordPolicy.summary: Queries the password policy of Resource Access Management (RAM) users, including the password strength.

GetPolicyVersion.title: GetPolicyVersion
GetPolicyVersion.summary: Queries the information about a policy version.

GetRole.title: GetRole
GetRole.summary: Queries information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

GetUser.title: GetUser
GetUser.summary: Queries information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

GetUserMFAInfo.title: GetUserMFAInfo
GetUserMFAInfo.summary: Queries the multi-factor authentication (MFA) device that is bound to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

ListAccessKeys.title: ListAccessKeys
ListAccessKeys.summary: Queries all AccessKey pairs that belong to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

ListEntitiesForPolicy.title: ListEntitiesForPolicy
ListEntitiesForPolicy.summary: Queries the entities to which a policy is attached.

ListGroups.title: ListGroups
ListGroups.summary: Queries Resource Access Management (RAM) user groups.

ListGroupsForUser.title: ListGroupsForUser
ListGroupsForUser.summary: Queries the Resource Access Management (RAM) user groups to which a RAM user belongs.

ListPoliciesForGroup.title: ListPoliciesForGroup
ListPoliciesForGroup.summary: Queries the policies that are attached to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

ListPoliciesForRole.title: ListPoliciesForRole
ListPoliciesForRole.summary: Queries the policies that are attached to a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

ListPoliciesForUser.title: ListPoliciesForUser
ListPoliciesForUser.summary: Queries the policies that are attached to a RAM user.

ListPolicyVersions.title: ListPolicyVersions
ListPolicyVersions.summary: Queries the versions of a policy.

ListRoles.title: ListRoles
ListRoles.summary: Queries all Resource Access Management (RAM) roles.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to cloud resources which are Resource Access Management (RAM) roles and policies.

ListUsers.title: ListUsers
ListUsers.summary: Queries the information about all RAM users.

ListUsersForGroup.title: ListUsersForGroup
ListUsersForGroup.summary: Queries Resource Access Management (RAM) users in a RAM user group.

RemoveUserFromGroup.title: RemoveUserFromGroup
RemoveUserFromGroup.summary: Removes a Resource Access Management (RAM) user from a RAM user group.

SetAccountAlias.title: SetAccountAlias
SetAccountAlias.summary: Configures an alias for an Alibaba Cloud account.

SetDefaultPolicyVersion.title: SetDefaultPolicyVersion
SetDefaultPolicyVersion.summary: Specifies a version for a policy as the default version.

SetPasswordPolicy.title: SetPasswordPolicy
SetPasswordPolicy.summary: Configures the password policy for Resource Access Management (RAM) users, including the password strength.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to cloud resources which are Resource Access Management (RAM) roles and policies.

UnbindMFADevice.title: UnbindMFADevice
UnbindMFADevice.summary: Unbinds a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device from a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from cloud resources that are Resource Access Management (RAM) roles and policies.

UpdateAccessKey.title: UpdateAccessKey
UpdateAccessKey.summary: Changes the status of an AccessKey pair that belongs to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

UpdateGroup.title: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.summary: Modifies a Resource Access Management (RAM) user group.

UpdateLoginProfile.title: UpdateLoginProfile
UpdateLoginProfile.summary: Modifies the logon configurations of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

UpdatePolicyDescription.title: UpdatePolicyDescription
UpdatePolicyDescription.summary: Modifies the description of a custom policy.

UpdateRole.title: UpdateRole
UpdateRole.summary: Modifies information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) role.

UpdateUser.title: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.summary: Modifies information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.
